objects.text:
• Digital LED Control Panel
• Energy-Efficient Performance
• Spacious Drum Design

Modern laundry solution with space-saving design
Perfect for contemporary homes and apartments

product_details.name: Insignia Smart Washer & Dryer Set - Modern Laundry Solution with Digital Controls
product_details.description:
• Sleek white design with modern digital display interface
• Large capacity front-loading washer and matching dryer
• Digital LED control panel with multiple wash/dry programs
• Energy-efficient performance for lower utility bills
• Advanced moisture sensing technology for optimal drying
• Multiple temperature settings for various fabric types
• Easy-to-use dial controls for program selection
• Spacious drum design for handling large loads
• Contemporary black door design with chrome accents
• Space-saving side-by-side configuration
• Advanced spin technology for better water extraction
• Delay start option for convenient scheduling
• Digital time remaining display
• Quiet operation technology
• Perfect for modern homes and apartments

banner_details:
The banner design is a visually compelling layout promoting a modern appliance set, split into two distinct sections. The left section features a dark blue gradient background that houses all the key text components, including a bold headline (`heading`), a futuristic subheading (`subheading`), a bulleted feature list (`features`), a highlighted price (`price`), a bright call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`), and a brief descriptive text (`description`). Geometric and abstract elements subtly enhance the background with lines and circles.

The right section contrasts with a clean, light gray background to display the appliance (`product_image`) clearly, amplifying its sleek design.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy Blue: `#2C3E50`
- Muted Slate Blue: `#4A6F8A`
- Sky Blue: `#4B9CD3`
- Light Gray: `#F7F7F7`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a sleek and modern twin washer-dryer unit with a clean, minimalistic design. Dominated by a crisp white background (#FFFFFF), it conveys cleanliness and simplicity. The front-loading doors are framed in deep charcoal black (#1C1C1C), drawing focus to the central control features, while transparent black glass (#2F2F2F) creates a subtle contrast and technological feel. Touches of metallic silver (#C0C0C0) on the control dials add sophistication, and the blue digital display text (#3399FF) pops out to highlight functionality. These colors blend seamlessly but are highlighted through high contrast and strategic placement, suggesting a balance of tech and elegance.
